arts.ttl: Haraldsson scores twice as Lille moves to third place in French league with 2-1 win over Monaco
arts.sum: Hakon Arnar Haraldsson scored a brace as Lille beat Monaco 2-1 Saturday and leapfrogged its French league rival to move into third place in the standings. Haraldsson, who joined Lille in July 2023 from FC Copenhagen, has scored four league goals this season.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Lille 2-1 Monaco: Hákon Arnar Haraldsson double takes LOSC onto podium
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 23, 22/02/25 Hákon Arnar Haraldsson’s first-half brace was enough to see Lille OSC beat AS Monaco (2-1) and provisionally take a place on the Ligue 1…
